summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Charles Street, in The City of Seattle, from Maynard Avenue to the existing plank roadway on Seattle Boulevard, by planking the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 1487 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
